attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaflet Blessings
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, heal all damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Verdant Storm
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moss Agate
attacks.text: Heal 100 damage from each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Triple Spin
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Wafting Heal
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may heal all damage from your Active Grass Pokémon. If you healed any damage in this way, discard all Energy from that Pokémon.

abilities.name: Festival Lead
abilities.text: If Festival Grounds is in play, this Pokémon may use an attack it has twice. If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent's Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Ripening Charge
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, heal 30 damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Syrup Storm
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Grass Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Teal Dance
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw a card.

attacks.name: Myriad Leaf Shower
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Destructive Flame
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fighting Blaze
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex or Pokémon V, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Burning Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Carnelian
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Flame Tackle
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Wrathful Hearth
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dynamic Blaze
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 140 more damage, and discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wash the Slate Clean
attacks.text: You may put 2 Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.

abilities.name: Festival Lead
abilities.text: If Festival Grounds is in play, this Pokémon may use an attack it has twice. If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent's Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Festival Lead
abilities.text: If Festival Grounds is in play, this Pokémon may use an attack it has twice. If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent's Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rapid Draw
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fighting Whirlpool
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex or Pokémon V, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Severe Squall
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon ex. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Aquamarine
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Permeating Chill
attacks.text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, put 9 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Frost Bullet
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Euclase
attacks.text: Knock Out 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has exactly 6 damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Sob
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Torrential Pump
attacks.text: You may shuffle 3 Energy attached to this Pokémon into your deck. If you do, this attack also does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Fighting Lightning
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex or Pokémon V, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Flashing Spear
attacks.text: You may discard up to 2 Basic Energy from your Benched Pokémon. This attack does 90 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Dravite
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Amp You Very Much
attacks.text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, take 1 more Prize card.

abilities.name: Initialization
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, Pokémon with a Rule Box in play (both yours and your opponent's) have no Abilities, except for Future Pokémon. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

attacks.name: Volt Cyclone
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic Assault
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psy Bolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Psych Out
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Amazez
attacks.text: Devolve each of your opponent's evolved Pokémon by shuffling the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Come and Get You
attacks.text: Put up to 3 Duskull from your discard pile onto your Bench.

abilities.name: Cursed Blast
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may put 5 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If you use this Ability, this Pokémon is Knocked Out.

abilities.name: Cursed Blast
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may put 13 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If you use this Ability, this Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Shadow Bind
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Perfume Press
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon ex.

attacks.name: Magical Charm
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do 100 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Angelite
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Shuffle those Pokémon and all attached cards into your opponent's deck. If 1 of your Pokémon used Angelite during your last turn, this attack can't be used.

attacks.name: Roaring Scream
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each damage counter on this Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Midnight Fluttering
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent's Active Pokémon has no Abilities, except for Midnight Fluttering.

attacks.name: Hex Hurl
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

abilities.name: Adrena-Brain
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached, you may move up to 3 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Adrena-Pheromone
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached and is damaged by an attack, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Energy Feather
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Adjusted Horn
attacks.text: If you don't have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Swelling Power
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Fighting Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Magma Purge
attacks.text: Discard up to 4 Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Tornado Rush
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Tornado Rush attack does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Battle-Hardened
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic Fighting Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mad Bite
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Land Collapse
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck. If you played an Ancient Supporter card from your hand during this turn, discard 3 more cards in this way.

abilities.name: Magnetic Absorption
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if your opponent has 4 or fewer Prize cards remaining, you may attach a Basic Fighting Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Earthen Spike
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Adrena-Power
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached, it gets +100 HP, and the attacks it uses do 100 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Cornerstone Stance
abilities.text: Prevent all damage from attacks done to this Pokémon by your opponent's Pokémon that have an Ability.

attacks.name: Demolish
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pitch-Black Blade
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Moon Mirage
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Onyx
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon, and take a Prize card.

attacks.name: Call to Muster
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Grind
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tyrannical Crush
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Vengeance Fletching
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Ancient card in your discard pile.

abilities.name: Protective Bell
abilities.text: All of your Pokémon take 10 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Iron Buster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Raging Hammer
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Metal Bridge
abilities.text: All of your Pokémon that have Metal Energy attached have no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Iron Blaster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Recon Directive
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Put the other card on the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Phantom Dive
attacks.text: Put 6 damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

abilities.name: Boosted Evolution
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, it can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Rainbow DNA
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve into any Pokémon ex that evolves from Eevee if you play it from your hand onto this Pokémon. (This Pokémon can't evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.)

attacks.name: Toss-and-Turn Press
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 120 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.text: This Pokémon can't be Asleep.

abilities.name: Jewel Seeker
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, if you have any Tera Pokémon in play, you may search your deck for up to 2 Trainer cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Dig
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Run Away Draw
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards. If you drew any cards in this way, shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Moomoo Rolling
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if this Pokémon used Rollout during your last turn.

attacks.name: Hyper Whirlpool
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fan Call
abilities.text: Once during your first turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Colorless Pokémon with 100 HP or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use more than 1 Fan Call Ability during your turn.

attacks.name: Assault Landing
attacks.text: If there is no Stadium in play, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Jewel Breaker
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Tera Pokémon, this attack does 230 more damage.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fur Coat
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rising Tackle
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sonic Blast
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Unified Beatdown
attacks.text: If you go second, you can't use this attack during your first turn. This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crown Opal
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic non-Colorless Pokémon.

name: Amarys
rules: Draw 4 cards. At the end of this turn, if you have 5 or more cards in your hand, discard your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Area Zero Underdepths
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Binding Mochi
rules: Attacks used by the Poisoned Pokémon this card is attached to do 40 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Black Belt's Training
rules: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do 40 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Black Belt's Training
rules: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do 40 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Black Belt's Training
rules: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do 40 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Black Belt's Training
rules: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do 40 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Briar
rules: You can use this card only if your opponent has exactly 2 Prize cards remaining.During this turn, if your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack used by your Tera Pokémon, take 1 more Prize card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Buddy
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon with 70 HP or less and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Bug Catching Set
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 2 in any combination of Grass Pokémon and Basic Grass Energy cards you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Carmine
rules: If you go first, you may use this card during your first turn.Discard your hand and draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Ciphermaniac's Codebreaking
rules: Search your deck for 2 cards, shuffle your deck, then put those cards on top of it in any order.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Crispin
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards of different types, reveal them, and put 1 of them into your hand. Attach the other to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Earthen Vessel
rules: You can use this card only if you discard another card from your hand.Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Explorer's Guidance
rules: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and put 2 of them into your hand. Discard the other cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Festival Grounds
rules: Each Pokémon that has any Energy attached (both yours and your opponent's) recovers from all Special Conditions and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Friends in Paldea
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Glass Trumpet
rules: You can use this card only if you have any Tera Pokémon in play.Choose up to 2 of your Benched Colorless Pokémon and attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to each of them.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Haban Berry
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Dragon Pokémon, it takes 60 less damage (after applying Weakness and Resistance), and discard this card.

name: Janine's Secret Art
rules: Choose up to 2 of your Darkness Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Basic Darkness Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. If you attached Energy to your Active Pokémon in this way, it is now Poisoned.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Kieran
rules: Choose 1:• Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.• During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex and Active Pokémon V (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lacey
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, draw 8 cards instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Larry's Skill
rules: Discard your hand and search your deck for a Pokémon, a Supporter card, and a Basic Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Max Rod
rules: Put up to 5 in any combination of Pokémon and Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Maximum Belt
rules: Attacks used by the Pokémon this card is attached to do 50 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Ogre's Mask
rules: Choose a Pokémon ex in your discard pile that has "Ogerpon" in its name, and switch it with 1 of your Pokémon ex in play that has "Ogerpon" in its name. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Prime Catcher
rules: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot. If you do, switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Professor Sada's Vitality
rules: Choose up to 2 of your Ancient Pokémon and attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to each of them. If you attached any Energy in this way, draw 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor Turo's Scenario
rules: Put 1 of your Pokémon in play into your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that Pokémon.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rescue Board
rules: The Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is Colorless less. If that Pokémon's remaining HP is 30 or less, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Roto
rules: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of Supporter cards you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Scoop Up Cyclone
rules: Put 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Sparkling Crystal
rules: When the Tera Pokémon this card is attached to uses an attack, that attack costs 1 Energy less. (The Energy can be of any type.)

name: Techno Radar
rules: You can use this card only if you discard another card from your hand.Search your deck for up to 2 Future Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Treasure Tracker
rules: Search your deck for up to 5 Pokémon Tool cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Amarys
rules: Draw 4 cards. At the end of this turn, if you have 5 or more cards in your hand, discard your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Atticus
rules: You can use this card only if your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned.Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Atticus
rules: You can use this card only if your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned.Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Brassius
rules: Count the cards in your hand, shuffle those cards into your deck, then draw that many cards plus 1.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Eri
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you discard up to 2 Item cards you find there.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Friends in Paldea
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Giacomo
rules: Discard a Special Energy from each of your opponent's Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Larry's Skill
rules: Discard your hand and search your deck for a Pokémon, a Supporter card, and a Basic Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Mela
rules: You can use this card only if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.Attach a Basic Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Ortega
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you choose a card you find there and put it on the bottom of their deck. If you put a card on the bottom of your opponent's deck in this way, your opponent may draw a card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Raifort
rules: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and discard any number of them. Put the other cards back in any order.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Tyme
rules: Tell your opponent the name of a Pokémon in your hand and put that Pokémon face down in front of you. Your opponent guesses that Pokémon's HP, and then you reveal it. If your opponent guessed right, they draw 4 cards. If they guessed wrong, you draw 4 cards. Then, return the Pokémon to your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

attacks.name: Twin Shotels
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on those Pokémon.

abilities.name: Magnetic Absorption
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if your opponent has 4 or fewer Prize cards remaining, you may attach a Basic Fighting Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Earthen Spike
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Cornerstone Stance
abilities.text: Prevent all damage from attacks done to this Pokémon by your opponent's Pokémon that have an Ability.

attacks.name: Demolish
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moon Mirage
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Onyx
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon, and take a Prize card.

attacks.name: Frenzied Gouging
attacks.text: Knock Out your opponent's Active Pokémon. If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out in this way, this Pokémon does 200 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Calamity Storm
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play. If you do, this attack does 120 more damage.

abilities.name: Subjugating Chains
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may switch 1 of your Benched Darkness Pokémon, except any Pecharunt ex, with your Active Pokémon. If you do, the new Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. You can't use more than 1 Subjugating Chains Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Irritated Outburst
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.name: Coin Bonus
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw a card. If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, draw 1 more card.

attacks.name: Make It Rain
attacks.text: Discard any number of Basic Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Phantom Dive
attacks.text: Put 6 damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Burst Roar
attacks.text: Discard your hand and draw 6 cards.

attacks.name: Bellowing Thunder
attacks.text: You may discard any amount of Basic Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 70 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

abilities.name: Rainbow DNA
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve into any Pokémon ex that evolves from Eevee if you play it from your hand onto this Pokémon. (This Pokémon can't evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.)

abilities.name: Seasoned Skill
abilities.text: Blood Moon used by this Pokémon costs Colorless less for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: Blood Moon
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Unified Beatdown
attacks.text: If you go second, you can't use this attack during your first turn. This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crown Opal
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic non-Colorless Pokémon.

name: Amarys
rules: Draw 4 cards. At the end of this turn, if you have 5 or more cards in your hand, discard your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Crispin
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards of different types, reveal them, and put 1 of them into your hand. Attach the other to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Drayton
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon and a Trainer card you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Janine's Secret Art
rules: Choose up to 2 of your Darkness Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Basic Darkness Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. If you attached Energy to your Active Pokémon in this way, it is now Poisoned.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Kieran
rules: Choose 1:• Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.• During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex and Active Pokémon V (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lacey
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, draw 8 cards instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Rapid Vernier
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon. If you do, you may move any amount of Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prism Edge
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Teal Dance
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw a card.

attacks.name: Myriad Leaf Shower
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Azure Seas
abilities.text: Damage from attacks used by this Pokémon isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Catharsis Roar
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 120 more damage.

abilities.name: Resolute Heart
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has full HP and would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, it is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

attacks.name: Topaz Bolt
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Unified Beatdown
attacks.text: If you go second, you can't use this attack during your first turn. This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crown Opal
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic non-Colorless Pokémon.
